content: David Walker -- Princeton David Walker Professor Princeton Computer Science Department Representative for Undergraduate Affairs Office Hours: web calendar or contact Colleen Kenny-McGinley Note: I am not looking for new students in the upcoming year. However, we have a new faculty member, Mae Milano, who joined the Princeton Computer Science Department in Spring 2024. Mae is looking for new students and I encourage you to consider her!
